issue.title: [CF 764] Legacy of the Emperor not registering as IncreasedStats buff
issue.body:
I have an icon to warn me when my druid doesn't have Gift of the Wild or an equivalent on. LotE just got cast on me, and is not being counted. Hope I grab the right string export. Gift of the Wild and Blessing of Kings are both working correctly with the icon.

^1^T^SType^Sbuff ^SName^SIncreasedStats ^SDurationMaxEnabled^B ^SSettingsPerView^T ^Sicon^T ^STexts^T ^N1^S5 ^t^t^t^SShowWhen^N3 ^SCustomTex^SMark~`of~`the~`Wild ^SEnabled^B ^SDurationMax^N300 ^t^N61501^S~`~| ^Sicon^^

^1^T^N1^T ^SAnchors^T ^N1^T ^Sy^N-2 ^Sx^N-2 ^Spoint^STOPLEFT ^SrelativePoint^STOPLEFT ^t^N2^T ^Sy^N-2 ^Sx^N-2 ^Spoint^STOPRIGHT ^SrelativePoint^STOPRIGHT ^t^Sn^N2 ^t^SStringName^SBinding/Label ^SSkinAs^SHotKey ^t^N2^T ^SDefaultText^S[Stacks:Hide(0)] ^SAnchors^T ^N1^T ^Sy^N2 ^Sx^N-2 ^Spoint^SBOTTOMRIGHT ^SrelativePoint^SBOTTOMRIGHT ^t^t^SStringName^SStacks ^SSkinAs^SCount ^t^SGUID^Sicon1 ^Sn^N2 ^SName^SIcon~`Layout~`1 ^SNoEdit^B ^t^N61501^S~`~| ^Stextlayout^Sicon1 ^^
